2_19dSnqd1GpiMTnuiD4n1tPasyKTDfNSFyz.body: This sounds like a really interesting project.  However, I have to say that I am a bit skeptical about how successful it could be.  A peer-to-peer package delivery system would have to compete with existing package delivery systems like the post, FedEx, and sharing economy efforts like Uber and Roadie.  Outside of a very small set of people, nobody cares about privacy unless they want to do something illegal.  Shipping has huge economies of scale and nobody is going to pay more for shipping *just* because it is p2p.
